option.value:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="pt-BR" data-theme="light">
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>SpeedClip</title>
  <base href="/">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
  <link rel="icon" type="image/x-icon" href="/favicon.ico">
  <!-- Tipografia Inter -->
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
  <script>
    (function() {
      try {
        var saved = localStorage.getItem('sc_theme');
        var theme = saved || (window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches ? 'dark' : 'light');
        document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', theme);
        document.documentElement.style.colorScheme = theme;
      } catch (e) {}
    })();
  </script>
  <style>
    /* CSS crítico para evitar flash de tema */
    html, body { height: 100%; }
    body { margin: 0; background: #f7f8fa; color: #0f141a; }
    html[data-theme='dark'] body { background: #0b0f14; color: #e6e9ee; }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <app-root></app-root>
</body>
</html>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<!doctype html>
<html lang="pt-BR" data-theme="light">
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>SpeedClip</title>
  <base href="/">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
  <link rel="icon" type="image/x-icon" href="/favicon.ico">
  <!-- Tipografia Inter -->
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
  <script>
    (function() {
      try {
        var saved = localStorage.getItem('sc_theme');
        var theme = saved || (window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches ? 'dark' : 'light');
        document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', theme);
        document.documentElement.style.colorScheme = theme;
      } catch (e) {}
    })();
  </script>
  <style>
    /* CSS crítico para evitar flash de tema (usa tokens) */
    html, body { height: 100%; }
    body { margin: 0; background: var(--color-bg); color: var(--color-text); }
  </style>
</head>
<body>
  <app-root></app-root>
</body>
</html>
